summary: To create a post-travel recovery exercise plan focusing on mobility and light cardio to ease Rohan back into his routine.
trigger: Rohan's new 2-week exercise plan was due, but he was traveling and had missed workouts.
rationale: Rohan informed the team he would be traveling from July 15th to 19th with a busy meeting schedule.
While traveling, he confirmed he had not had a chance to work out.
The decision was to create a 'recovery' plan to help him transition back, rather than a standard plan.
